snippet: The former Dallas Cowboys tackle Josh Brent will spend at least 45 days in rehab for substance abuse after his release from jail in the drunken-driving crash that killed a teammate.
abstract: Former Dallas Cowboys tackle Josh Brent will spend at least 45 days in rehab for substance abuse after his release from jail in drunk driving crash that killed teammate.
lead_paragraph: The former Dallas Cowboys tackle Josh Brent will spend at least 45 days in rehab for substance abuse after his release from jail in the drunken-driving crash that killed a teammate.
